page.title: 10GOVERNMENT (LOCAL)
page.content:
The main services administered from {Chesterfield Town Hall}are as follows:
1.{Borough Town Hall:-}Highway and Sewer Maintenance with emergency services. 2.{Environmental Health Dept:- Cleansing, Refuse and Meals on Wheels. 3.{Housing Dept:-}Council Housing and 35 Wardens for Old People's Homes. 4.{Transport Dept:-}Running the bus services and Employees Social Club. 5.{Planning and Estates:-}Building Regs., Planning, Pavements Shopping Centre, Markets and Abattoir. 6.{Recreation/Leisure:-}Swimming Pool, Cemetary, Golf Course, 2 Parks, Nursery, 6 Public Halls and Information Centre. 7.{The Mayor, Town Clerk and Borough {Treasurer}have their offices in the Town Hall.
